content.detailedDescription: It was about 7:24pm. i had just finished speaking at a phoenix mufon meeting and my wife and i where driving to a skywatch with the arizona mufon state director jim mann. traveling east on us60.  just before the gilbert road exit i noticed something in the sky to the south of us, or off to the right of the car. it was about 90 degrees above the horizon. looking closer i realized it was huge cylinder-shaped ufo. i watched it for about 30 seconds to make sure i was indeed seeing a ufo before i alerted jim mann. the 3 of us watched the object for about another 30 to 45 seconds when it suddenly shrank in size and turn into a small, rapidly blinking light and then it dissapeared. the sky was clear and free of any clouds.
content.summary: Very large, bluish white cylinder of light with orange-red lights on bottom.

content.detailedDescription: On 9/8/2011 at almost 8:00 p.M. i was working on a addition to my home , i was on my front porch and out of the corner of my eye i witnessed a flash of bright redish orange light , i turned immediatly and seen what i could only comprehend as a fireball of a size that was unbelievable and the light that came from it was of an intensity that was frightening , i witnessed an object that appeared to come out of thin air , it left a short trail , of light as it appeared , then it stopped and glowed , and pulsated , with a light that was so intense and powerfull that i was expecting an explosion or something worse , the event lasted approximatly 10 seconds or less but what has kept bothering me since the event was when it disappeared , the object left a trail just as it did when it appeared and it was gone , it disappeared into thin air just as it appeared out of thin air , i have replayed what i saw in my mind and it has plagued me since , when the object appeared , stopped for what was seconds and pulsated with a light that was of an intensity that was not natural , it was a light that was of immense power and literally scared me to a point that i expected an explosion ,the object was controlled , it has taken me some time to comprehend what i witnessed , at first i was so frightened that i contacted the charlotte county police and several officers responded to my home , i told them what i witnessed , at the tme i could only desribe it as a fireball meteor , i also called channel 13 news to report what i witnessed in hopes that others seen it to , i was worried that something bad had happened , i now no longer believe what i witnessed was a meteor , it could'nt have been , it just did'nt have the appearance of one and it stopped and pulsated , i also reported it as a meteor sighting to the american meteor society at the time and as i did in the back of my mind i felt what i saw was not a meteor but i could not comprehend it to be anything else , since the event i have felt a sense of impending doom , what i witnessed was not natural , i feel i witnessed a power greater than any known on earth and it was'nt friendly , i feel it was a probe of some sort , a presense of emense power and destructive capabilities , i am sure that what i witnessed had intelligence and intent .
content.summary: I witnessed an event that has left me with a feeling of impending doom , what i saw was not a meteor as i first thought , something bad is about to happen .

content.detailedDescription: I woke up exceptionally early at 4am. when i went outside i saw what appeared to be a huge star in the dark sky. it was way too big to be a star. then i thought maybe it is that satelite that is supposed to fall.  i realized it was getting bigger. it was in the eastern sky slightly to the south of the rising sun. i think it stayed rather stationary as it grew in size until it took off upward. through binoculars it seemed transparent and then solid. i could see 2 or 3 pinpricks of light on it. these lights may have been moving. a small biplane entered this sector of the sky at about 5:30 am. it disappeared at about 6:30 to 6:45. sorry wasn't watching the time when it left. it looked like an upside down teardrop or diamond. my dad saw this too. i took a picture with my house in it for scale. it is not a good quality from my cell phone.
content.summary: 5am: extremely bright diamond shaped blueish light. thru binoculars i could see 2 pinpricks of even brighter light. i am not sure but they appeared to move occasionally. as it grew it the glowing got brighter and dimmer. 1/5 sz of moon.

content.detailedDescription: 9-17-11, 9pm - we were sitting outside and noticed high in the sky and a pretty good distance away - three glowing solid yellow/orange moving lights in the shape of a triangle that moved from east to west in a horizontal path. the triangle retained its shape the entire time we observed it. this was followed by 8-10 more single orbs coming into view one at a time from the exact same spot in the east (behind the trees so we could not see where it was) into the clear night sky and disappearing into the west - where trees also blocked our view to the west but you could visually follow the lights a greater distance that direction. these orbs were in high the sky where you would notice airplane lights. at one point we did see an airplane in the distance somewhat below the orbs. the orbs appeared to be closer to us than the plane. we also noticed a glowing, a pulsating light that lit up a large area of the sky behind the trees, this light appeared caused by something ground level, it shined behind the trees and into the sky below the spot where the orbs first came into view - this reflection of light was similar to what you would see if there were a fire or something, and trees or buildings blocked your view of what was creating the light - but there were no sirens or noise of any kind. we ran to the computer to see if we could find out if there was something happening nearby, fire/emergency, but could find no information. we continued to watch the single orbs come into view one by one and eventually the glowing ground level light was gone when we looked back for it. during this time we also saw 4 rotating searchlights shining up to the cloud cover, the commercial type that are used to promote grand openings and things like. these were shining into the sky underneath where the orbs were traveling east to west, but did not reach up as high as where we were watching the orbs. we do have a small airport in the area but we did not think the searchlights coincided with the airport location. it was pretty hard to tell distances as the backyard we were in was lined with very tall trees and there are many tall trees behind those trees too. one in our group was able to video the sky with his ipad but was not interested reporting the incident or releasing the video.
content.summary: Yellow/orange lights move from east to west above treetops, 3 lights in triangle formation

content.detailedDescription: While taking a walk at sunset i noticed a very bright starlike object in the northern sky, far enough away that it was obscured by the few clouds that passed in front of it.  i thought it might be a star but it was still too light out for any stars to appear.  i returned home and got my binoculars and viewed the object which was clearly the shape of a hot air balloon (or triangle or heart).  it appeared to be stationary and very far away. i then looked at it through a telescope and affirmed that it was reflecting the light of the sun.  my husband joined me and as we looked at it through telescope and binoculars, it slowly changed color to reflect the setting sun - from bright silver to orange to deep red.  it also appeared to move very slowly toward the west, as a star or planet would do.  we both think it was some sort of weather balloon or other reflective device of terrestrial origin, but it was puzzling nevertheless, so i thought i would report it.
content.summary: Reflective balloon-shaped object in northern sky

content.detailedDescription: Extremely bright, star like objects seem to appear out of nowhere on the western shore of lake harris fl.  have been watching for some time.  sightings occur at random, most always after 10pm.  my p.O.V is approx. 3 miles from object.  first sighting, object pulsated like strobe light, hovering north to south, then to and fro.  object also hummed, as electricity (you could almost feel it, and no, it wasn't an air boat - extremely electric).  this particular sighting (late august), the light instantly deadened into laser-like, non directional bright red light (not a boat light, i see thousands of them) and disappeared for the night. it is alligator hunting season on the lake right now, and i know a spot light, (or air boat) from something unusual, as this light is not directional, and perhaps many thousands of watts - something unlike of even the strongest spotlights.  it also appears that the when light gets excited, nearby dock lights and street lights nearby on the mainland began to pulse and flicker, as if a magnetic field is being disturbed.  the luminosity of the light is also not of a typical indacacent, or led lamp - just too dammed bright and mesmerizing.  light is extremely bright, sharp and clear, changing many colors as a morning star, pulsating from a small flicker to a ball of electricity in milliseconds.  light suddenly appears and disappears at random - maybe 10 minutes, to several hours, sometimes moving, sometimes not, (it doesn't seem to have a schedule).  another unusual aspect of these sightings are the location of the phenomena - always on the west shore, where development is very scarce, near yalaha (doesn't seem to enjoy human company).  object appears to be "smart", as every time i walk to the dock for photo's, and vid's, instantly vanishes to reveal faint, small, green/blue, and red lights, appearing to synchronize in unusual patterns, only to reappear once i walked back away from it (very spooky).  i have also noticed that overhead oia, leesburg air traffic, and passing boats seem to make it hide until the coast is clear.   on one particular occasion, light was instantly joined by several other lights - some appearing to "wind" down the hill to the shore, and then hovering above the lake, sometimes disappearing and reappearing in different locations immediate to original location.  i have lived on the lake for over five years and have never seen something quite so seemingly un-human.  i decided to file this report (i couldn't "nah,it's probably a boat" any longer. - 9/16/2011 - as this particular sighting, i studied the sky to find that overhead lights that i though were stars, were moving very erratically at very high altitude, if not leo - very strange to say the least, as if the overhead lights and lights on lake were working together.  as fore-mentioned, it is hunting season (i hunt myself) and i have been wrong before, although i have seen many hunting boats with spotlights that look like dwarfs to this thing.  i suppose it may be wildlife officials, however, why the same location numerous nights, and with such erratic, somehow pointless and  almost impossible behavior?  there are many thousands of acres of water here.  i seriously doubt that law enforcement would patrol just 1/1000 of the water coverage.  just doesn't make sense.  i will update mufon on future sightings, as i will research (and watch) a little further. i hope someone else has seen this phenomena.  i really don't feel like being the village idiot ya' know.  as a note - the particular location of phenomena happens to be the deepest point of this, and all connecting lakes, and is also home to a few fifth magnitude springs.  i found this to be a interesting.  peace!
content.shape: Circle,   Fireball,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Other
content.summary: Star like orb - unusually strong pulsating light - numerous colors/patterns

content.detailedDescription: Got out of a restaurant with my girlfrend and her family. we saw about 20 plus ufo's ascending from the east to west and would disintegrate. they blinked out almost right above our heads. they had different fleet line ups some that were closer to each other would group up in triangulate positions, and disintegrate quicker than the ones that weren't by one another. they were glowing orange with small red lights on top. i notice that a airplane changed its path to get a better look. i did get video of it but however i left my cam at my parents place i will update with it tomorrow.
content.summary: got out of a restaurant with my girlfrend and her family. we saw about 20 plus ufo's ascending from the east to west and would disintegrate.

content.detailedDescription: I was inside our house watching the abc friday night movie (one of the pink panther movies).  i was going on 13 years old at the time.  i noticed some commotion from other family members going in and out the front door.  the other family members were my grandmother, my mother, and two of my brothers.  i asked what was going on.  they said there was a ufo down the street.  i went outside with them and saw a disk-shaped object with lights hovering over a house 3 or 4 hundred yards down the street.  the object was approximately 40 or 50 feet in the air.  there were 10 or 12 white lights rotating at its perimeter, in what i remember to be a counter-clockwise direction as seen from below.  i couldn't tell if the entire object was rotating or just the lights.  at the time, i believe we all assumed that it was just the lights.  there was one red light on the top.  the red light made it look as though it were trying mimic a water tower.  the object was otherwise completely dark, and only visible as a blackness blotting out the ambient city lights of dallas which cast a white haze in the sky.  as soon as we all got outside, the object started moving up the street toward us.  it move at about 5 miles an hour directly over the street.  as soon as it came to the front of our house it stopped.  there was no noise or wind.  the rest of the neighborhood was very quiet and no cars drove by.  my oldest brother just kept saying, "a real ufo, a real ufo."  none of us seemed  frightened or overly excited.  i remember looking at the two bedroom house across the street and thinking that the ufo was the same size as that house.  i remembered a portion of the book "chariots of the gods" which i had read.  it said that an old man regrew new teeth after having worn dentures after an encounter with a ufo.  i decided to try to communicate a message to the object or its inhabitants, asking if they could help my grandmother with her arthritis, which had confined her to a wheelchair.  after  few seconds, my other brother said he was going to call the police.  we were all standing in the area near the front door.  i wanted to walk out to the driveway, but thought it might be dangerous.  my brother and i started to get excited.  i ran upstairs to see if i could find the camera.  as soon as i got to my parents closet, i realized that the camera probably didn't have film, plus i didn't want to be there by myself.  i ran back downstairs and outside where they were still watching it.  my brother and i then ran in and got on the phone to call the police.  somebody said that it was moving away.  i went outside and saw that it had started moving up the street, continuing in the same direction as it had.  it veered slightly to the south (no longer directly over the street) and went out of view behind the houses at the top of the street.  half and hour or so later, a police officer from the richardson police department came to our house and took our very strange statement.  the next night we observed it again, only now it was about 2 miles to the south and perhaps 2,000 or 3,000 feet in the air.  a small aircraft seemed to be attempting to get close to it, but the object continually moved away.  as i remember, both the object and the aircraft moved further to the south until i could no longer see them.  i have a follow-up incident which occurred exactly 11 years later, which i will document on this site within the next week or so.
content.summary: Disk-shaped with 10-12 round white lights rotating on the perimeter and one small red light on top

content.detailedDescription: Sept 17, 20011 i was sitting on the fannindel gym parking lot waiting for my grandson to come out from a dance when i saw a bright red ball in the sky. it was at 8:28 pm. i got out of my pickup to better observe it and to be sure it was not a reflection from the glass. it was moving from a southly direction, slighly nnw and curved to about due north. there were some high thin clouds and it was below the clouds. it appeared to be moving at about 100 mph. as i was watching it my grandson came out and i pointed at it and he saw it and started yelling "what is it?" i watched it for about five minutes as it slowly disappearded to the north in the general direction of bonham, texas. i did not hear any sounds and there was no wind at the time. this thing was very large, i would guess at least 300 feet in diameter and a very bright red with a fainter red aura that tapered into a short point. the tail was short, about one third the diameter of the sphere. the aura appeared to be about one fourth larger than the sphere or about 350 to 375 feet in diameter not counting the short taper. the sphere had a definate outline and looked to be solid and glowing. it is difficult to say how high it was, but it appeared to be about 5,000 ft. or a little less.
content.summary: Large bright red spere with a red aura that had a short taper to a pointed end. appeared to be moving approximately 100mph

content.detailedDescription:
It was approximately 9-910pm.  my neighbor and his friend knocked on my door and started to tell me about these abnormal lights they saw in the sky.  then we saw one orangeish light in the sky.  it was north/north west from my house, so it appeared to be above lake erie.

the light was visible for about a minute.  it appeared to be moving west(left in the sky) slightly, the light started to fade a little bit, then competely dissappeared.  during this time the light moved up and down slightly.  the light was orange, but didn't appear to be a fireball. it was not making any sounds that we could hear. 

my neighbor and his friend then told me that maybe 4-5 minutes before, they steped outside thier house to smoke.  they saw 6 orange lights (like the one i saw).  the lights appeared to be north/north west (again appearing to be above lake erie)  they ran into their front yard to get a better look.  the six lights appeared to be in some sort of formation, moving together.  during this time multipe car alarms in our neighbor hood alarmed (i heard these while i was inside my house)  the car alarms were on different streets.  after about a minute or two, they came and knocked on my door, that is when i saw the one light i previously mentioned.  

when i first saw the object, i wasn't sure what it was, planes usually appear higher in the sky.  also i've never seen a plane with an orange light like that.  i really couldn't think of any logical explanations, especially after the story my neighbor and his friend told me of seeing six lights.  we all found it to be slightly odd that there were a number of car alarms that had gone off as well.  i have no clue what it was, but it was definitly out of the ordinary.
content.summary: It was an orange light, moved appx. west the light faded slightly, then it vanished

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were out on my front step and we notice lights. we thought it was just lightning at the time until it started changing colors and gradually fading from one color to another. it would flash in patterns, then randomly. we couldn't see the object itself, but i never seen lightning do anything like that before. it lasted for about a minute and i ran inside the house to grab my mom, but when we came outside, my girlfriend informed us that it had stopped. we were both pretty amazed at what we had witnessed and wish we knew exactly what it was.
content.summary: Strange lights above cloud cover

content.detailedDescription:
Witnessed a stationary triangular formation of lights under a cloud layer. they grew brighter, then vanished, in a time span of a few minutes.

i have a masters degree in aeronauticas science
content.summary: Triangular patern brightened then vanished

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with my son and we noticed a red light in the sky over our house. it was too large to be a star or planet and the color was spectacularly red! i grabbed my video camera and recorded it for several minutes- the camera was clearly showing it recording however the tape is blank with the exception of a few seconds wich is puzzling. observed it moving very slowly in a north or northeast direction. then after pulsating more with a very large bright one it disappeared
content.summary: Very red light ( like the intensity of a laser) over our house pulsating and moving extremely slowly before disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were taking our dog out, before retiring for the night. i was pointing to the moon and showing her that the star to the right of the moon was on the left of the moon last evening. i was watching the sky as i told her that last evening there seemed to be crazy air traffic going on for about 2 hours, as i was saying this a huge white sphere with a beautiful blue halo / aura around it appeared suddenly, in fast decent at about a 45 degree angle. it appeared to be going to crash, i watched it disappear right into the trees of the mountain. i am a star/ sky watcher and have seen comets and shooting stars many times, i had the feeling as i watched this that this craft was in trouble, and would crash. i waited and listened, but heard nothing. i watched for an explosion, none, i waited but never saw the craft leave the trees. my daughter and i told no one what we saw, as the night went on, i became very aware that i needed to tell someone what i saw. i realized even if the authorities found something they would just lie anyway. while lying in bed trying to put the event out of my thoughts, i realized i could tell people that don't lie, and want to tell the truth, so i called a number on the mufon web site, and told them my story. this is not my first sighting, but it is by far the most upsetting one, as i am sure the craft has crashed. for those of you who are asking the exact same question i would ask if i read this story, why didn't i go check it out? i live in the country, i am not familiar with that area of woodland, it was pitch black outside, cold and i am a middle aged woman. frankly i was afraid, and i didn't wish to scare my daughter anymore than she already was. i may go in the morning though.
content.summary: I watched a round white brightly lit object with a blue halo/ aura, rapidly descend into the trees, i would say it was traveling at aprox 50 60 mph. it never came out of the trees. int

content.detailedDescription: 9 pm first, i saw a bright white light streak across the sky. my husband missed it and we argued the fact that it could have been a shooting star. i was very excited and sure it was something else. later i decided to sit outside and watch the sky for a while. after about 10 mintues a bright orange light appeared. it looked like a planet or something, but it just appeared. i watched it thinking maybe it was hidden behind clouds before, but i couldn't see any close to it...Soon it started flickering and disappeared! i knew i saw a ufo! i ran in to get the hubby and i looked out the window and there it was again! this time red and bigger!!! we rushed outside and looked at it thru binoculars and saw that it was not blinking like a plane, just pulsed. this time it was moving, very slowly south, as we noticed a plane pass it much faster. it again disappeared! my husband went inside because his stomach was hurting so i ran to get my sister from next door. as soon as we came out it was back! and it was bright bright red! my sister was like omg it really is a ufo!!! we watched it for about 3 minutes. it pulsed but stayed in one spot before it flickered and disappeared once again. it did not come back this time but my family and i are fully convinced of what we saw!
content.summary: A disappearing and reappearing orb

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving behind royal pacific resort in orlando, fl at 10:32 pm est when i looked in a southerly direction. i noticed what looked like an orange glow ascend from above the hotel skyline. it almost looked like a shuttle launch, but i wasn't aware of cape canaveral launching any rockets this evening. i parked my vehicle and got outside. i watched as it ascended to a top-most vertical point and started to move horizontally in a south to north direction. it moved almost directly overhead. as i watched what was moving over me, it had what looked like a yellow center and had an orange glow. it was radiating almost like a bright light. 

it was moving slowly across the sky, much to slow to be a meteor. the movement was constant. it did not speed up or slow down. as it progressed in the northerly direction, its luminosity started to degrade until i couldn't see it anymore. the entire event lasted approximately 1 minute. the size of the object was approximately an aspirin if you were to hold one out at arms length looking toward the skyline. when it passed over me, the object looked to large to be a rocket moving overhead.
content.summary: Yellow-orange orb that ascended, and moved in a s-n direction for about 1 min. until it faded out of site.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from work and i turned off of highway 100 onto rawson avenue in franklin, wisconsin.  it is a very dark road and i saw a flash of light off to the right side of my windshield.  i looked up and saw a very large glowing object hovering i would estimate a 1/2 mile above the ground.  i slowed the car down to watch it and it took off at super sonic speed (the best way i can describe it) into the clouds.  there was a oncoming car that stopped in the road too so i assume  the occupants saw it too.  i was spooked after it for awhile.
content.summary: Glowing object hovering and then taking off at super speed into clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
If you are on dish network, there's a channel called dish earth (287 for me)....I have looked at it during the day lots of times, but tonight is the first time for night.....I'm seeing ufos!

at first, i noticed this purple glow on the dark side of earth....Then it looked like an eye.....Now, i think it's a very large ship, 3/4 the size of earth, not quite cloaked. and then i saw a bright light come and stay on for a few seconds, then poof! gone! the west side is  so bright with sunlight it's blinding.....Actually looks like a crescent moon. the dark side is where you can see the ship. big purple circle covering the earth.....Transparent....Looks like the earth is an eye. where it looks like the pupil is .... is where i saw the light come/go. the red dot on the upper left is a reflection off of my phone.
content.summary: Purple, not quite cloaked. transparent. above earth's atmosphere.

content.detailedDescription: Over 4 and james st  super bright object over kc bottoms at the cloud line lasted 30 seconds shape resembled a half moon but the size of about 500 to 1000 in diameter.  it disappeared into the sky. this object was about 200 feet south of i70 and as bright as the sun at 5pm today
content.summary: Half moon shaped object

content.detailedDescription: I was in idaho helping with the family farm during harvest time. my job was driving a truck hauling grain (wheat) with another friend of the family, a farmer of over 30 years in the business. i positioned my truck directly in front of my friends truck awaiting a loaded combine. i then stepped out of the truck to make a phone call walking several paces away to escape some of the noise. after i had dialed my phone waiting for it to answer, i heard my friend yelling to me from 50 yards away and saw him pointing to the top of a hill of wheat stubble. he was trying to bring attention to a wolf he sighted that came into view just over the hill about 150 yards in front of us. i looked but did not see the wolf that quickly retreated back down the other side of the hill. it was nearing the end of the day and the sun had just fallen behind the tree line to the west. what did become apparent to me was a stationary yellowish object maybe the size of an aspirin at arms's length at 40 to 60 degrees from the top of the hill. i disregarded at first but pointed it out to the other driver muttering "its kind of early for a star to be showing up", and this not being my first unexplainable aerial object, i went about my business for a couple of minutes and noticed that the "star" had "dropped" a few degrees and it was then that i brought it to the drivers attention. as we were both watching it, it started moving, not in a quick flash or sudden motion, but in a smooth even acceleration towards the east until it just faded out of sight in the distance making no noise. i know that the horizon was fairly clear and the line of sight was about 75 to 100 miles toward montana, as we were at 3,000 feet at the time on a hill in a wheat field with an unfettered view to the east. i asked him as the object faded from view "did we just see a ufo"? he replied, "i have seen this type of activity before in this region as i was farming several years ago about 25 or 30 miles from here where i saw a stationary object drop out of sight". as we watched this object we agreed that the object may have been moving 600 to 800 mph what with the perspective and angle that it traveled.
content.summary: Dark yellow to amber, round, stationary.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend were riding home in her car at 1am, going north. we noticed 3 sequentially flashing lights, at first we almost thought it was a radio tower until it started to very slowly, move downward. then it started moving perpendicularly to it's previous path at a pretty quick pace. it continued until it was obscured my trees.I have personally witnessed two other undeniable ufo's so i was very excited to see this phenomenom.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Red flashing lights on a dark object in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was indian rocks beach in front of my friends house on the street. i looked up and saw it flying below the cloud cover and observed it as a solid black cone like object with some kind of weird appendage on it. there were no blinking lights on it and after observing it flying in a northerly direction about 500 ft off the ground i got binoculars and looked at it. i watched it for a minute or more and it seemed to turn and fly out to sea. it vanished while we were watching it fly along about a quarter mile from the three of us. i have been an investigator and have seen 15 ufo's this didn't look like any of them. it did resemble one of the craft in anthony woods documentary. after the ufo disappeared there was still a lot of cloud cover. a jet appeared and began spraying chemtrails.
content.summary: Unknown object black cone with appendage no wings

content.detailedDescription: Two days ago there were some very bright lights on the groung a few blocks away and a girl shot a video of some lights in the sky here in ballinger, tx. i am writing to see if you could take a quick look at this and give your opinion on it. it looks like flares from a jet or helicopter but they are alot slower than the ones i've seen. thank you.
content.summary: Similar to flares from jet but slower

content.detailedDescription:
here is a copy of the message i just sent to the supervisor of ossining ny

i would like to make the following report to you prefaced by this disclaimer--i am 75 years old and in excellent health and do not drink or do drugs--i have a science background and am well experienced in nature observations being a hiker and birdwatcher for 60 years---i recently purchased my first boat-- a 22ft bayliner cruiser and made a trip to the city and misjudged my time coming back to newburgh and by the time i got to the tappan zee bridge it was totally dark on the evening of wed aug 10 at about 8:30pm--as i passed under the bridge and left it behind i saw in the darkness ahead of me about a mile --right off the bank of ossining several hundred yards there were two red lights and three white lights traveling just about the speed of jetskis going back and forth on the water--there were no other boats in the whole area anywhere near--all i could see ahead of me was the expanse of dark water and these lights going back and forth just like jet skis racing with each other---as i proceeded north i said to myself --these guys must be crazy driving around at night on jetskis and i better not get to close to them--as i kept going north i veered to the left but as i got closer --to my surprise i could not see any body riding jetskis---only the lights that were racing back and forth--and these lights were not above the water line as i discovered when my curiosity made me go closer to see what in the hell is this---the closer i got i could see the lights were underwater as though someone was shining a flashlight up from below and circular about the size of a grapefruit--as i slowly approached closer to the lights which were moving very fast back and forth they suddenly came all together in a small circle about the size of a pizza and all of a sudden started spinning around each other and just disappeared-i must have been about 20 ft away looking right down at them in the water when that happened--i have never seen anything out of the ordinary in my whole life and have always been skeptical of all the reports of ufo's etc and now here i am having seen this unexplained phenomenon---the next day [thur]i saw a report on the ynn cable news that ossining had some problem with a  sewage release off shore---could this incident be connected in any way?---very curious----sambuco  sambuca
the mayor responded that he did not think the incidents were related but thought my experience was very curious indeed!
content.summary: Moving lights

content.detailedDescription: My son called from 1 mile away, told us to look into the sky.  we saw 5 red lights in a straight line.  to close together to be airplanes.  they were heading west bound one made a 45 degree turn south.  they all at one point went straight up until lights disappeared.  they next day our neighbor said they saw the same thing.
content.summary: 5 lights in straight line then 1 by 1 went straight up

content.detailedDescription:
It was approximately 12:33ish am very early friday morning.  i was traveling directly east on saginaw street from downtown lansing to pick up some mcdonald's at the eastern city limits of lansing before you enter east lansing.  i was traveling about 40 mph, and it was already unusual as there wasn't another car on this well-traveled through-way at least for another mile ahead of me or behind me (you travel down a kind of steep drop, so you can see a lot of the street).

at the bottom of the slope i come upon marshall park which would be directly to your north and looking left out of your window.  marshall street is the major intersection here with the light and the area is composed of a lot of schools and open fields so you get a view of the sky.  anyway, i see a blinking light above marshall park; it couldn't have been anymore than 500 feet above me and no more than 300 feet north of my vehicle.  the blinking light was attached to an object whose shape couldn't be made out because the light was not unusually bright, nor was the object itself illuminated.

being that the object wasn't moving erratically and kept on a straight path, i originally thought little of it.  what began to really catch my attention, though, was that this thing was moving parallel to my vehicle, and it began to pick-up speed at an unusual (but gradual) rate, definitely faster than any airplane could increase it's speed.  what really got me disturbed me, though, was that the interval of the blinking light on the object (about the same brightness, size, and color (white) of beacons on a plane wing or helicopter) was just ever so off, and unlike the beacon on a conventional aircraft which either strobe or slowly pulsate off and on, this blinking light would go completely out when it dimmed and then appear back on; it's the only way i can describe it, it simply wasn't a normal blinking light.  i noticed that i was beginning to get uncomfortable because i couldn't make sense of what this thing was.  

i couldn't have been watching it for more than 30-40 seconds, and was reaching where the homes and the neighborhood come back up to saginaw street at the intersection of fairview when i also realized that this thing wasn't making any sound, at all.  this is when i totally ruled it out as a helicopter.  i began to lose the thing over the homes, businesses, and trees around frandor shopping center as it continued to accelerate.  i was so mesmerized with the thing that instead of stopping at planned at the mcdonald's at frandor shopping center, that i continued to try and follow the thing by continuing up saginaw street (instead of continuing down grand river avenue where the two split at the city borders), but neither street continues directly east so i began to lose the object.  last i saw it it had not just continued east but was now heading upward, but not at some unusual angle.  i estimated at 12:38 am that the object had to be somewhere over okemos or immediately to the east of there given the distance.

to summarize, what i found odd about the object was the slightly-off blinking light, it's unusually straight eastward and upward path as if it was being pulled on a string, its unusual acceleration, and the fact that i didn't hear any kind of engine despite the thing being only a few hundred feet away from me and above me when i first saw it.  the object seemed to move so smoothly through the air as if completely unincumbered by friction.  it didn't seem to be subject to any physical laws.
content.summary: Silent, blinking object above lansing

content.detailedDescription: This is a direct response to the posting of ufo over denver mon, sep,12,2011 at 8 p.M! i too witnessed this event and i must say i was awestruck, however upon further examining it is my conclusion that the supposed ufo's/orbs were not out of the world visitors, but instead they were straight from buckley air national guard, more specifically four (4) f-16's doing a flyover of the opening night monday football game of the denver broncos at the conclusion of the national anthem, as they have done for many years on the opening day football game. the kickoff was held shortly after 8 pm preceding the national anthem, and there was massive low cloud coverage over denver at that exact time, which later turned to rain. the visual ceiling for that night for ifr, and vfr flight was approximately 6500=7000 feet broken!  the f-16's were flying in formation with their navigation landing lights on, which may have given the illusion of bright white yellow orbs to those who were more than a mile away from the stadium. my direct vantage point was in westminster, looking south when i too saw this event around 8 pm! once the jets flew over the stadium they broke formation turned off their nav lights to form a staggered formation to return to base! i wish this was a true ufo sighting, but i am sorry to say it was a natural man made event!
content.summary: Ufo over denver update

content.detailedDescription: One the way home at roughly 8:30 pm in turlock, ca on 9-15-11, on a crystal clear light. i noticed 3 bright lights forming a perfect triangle in the sky. it was flying too slow to be planes and the three lights were perfectly aligned in a vertical triangle. it was enormous and you could see an outline of an object. we looked at it for about three minutes. my two kids got scared and didn't want to stop. we hurried home to look at it some more and it was gone. i have never seen anything like it but it didn't look like planes flying in formation and the three lights made it an exact triangle. it was enormous. it was something and it was huge. i can't think of anything logical that it could have been. other than three planes flying in a triangle formation very slowly with bright lights which is very unlikely as this is a small rural town in central california. we also do not have any tall buildings or radio towers in that area. it is just flat and the sky was extremely clear. i am skeptical because i don't believe in ufos but i saw something very unusual.
content.summary: Giant triangle object with faint outline hovering and flying slow

content.detailedDescription:
On 09/14/11 at approx. 1400 hours my wife and i pulled off of the i-15 north at stoddard road for a break. it was partially cloudy with great visibility.
my wife saw it first. about six miles to the east (from stoddard wells rd., towards barstow) approx. six bright metal objects hovering in a semi circle near some clouds. they moved about independently, side to side, up, down but remained more or less in the same pattern.
a couple of minutes later and very suddenly there were two black objects below this cloud. they looked like swept wing planes , very geometric not like the other objects which were teardrop shaped.
both sets moved on to the south at about the same respective altitudes. we lost sight of the teardrop shaped objects first, and then the "blackbirds".
one of the "blackbirds" appeared briefly under neath other clouds further south.
all oblects appeared very small. i gather we were some miles away and they were at a pretty decent altitude. we were amazed by what we saw but were not aprehensive or fearful.
content.summary: We saw approx. 6 silver teardrop ufo in a circle moving about at about 6 mi and 15000 alt. then 2 blk aircraft looked f117 at lower altitude. then both flew south till out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
It was an unusually clear night without a cloud in the sky around. even the smells from the pastures and farms around my home were more pungent than i had ever noticed before. while taking my dog outside at around 10pm est, i heard unusual buzzing/humming noises behind the distant tree line to the north, though having an indiscernible point of reference. the sound was unlike anything i would knowingly recognize (e.G. commercial/private plane, ultralight plane, motorcycle, atv, etc.) the noise faded and, while i still stared in the general direction, a light source began to emerge as if rising up from behind the tree line, seeming to be an aircraft gaining altitude and moving closer.

as the light source rose in elevation, it then moved distinctly upward and left from my viewpoint. at first i viewed it as a plane turning and climbing in altitude, yet it rose as rapidly as any aircraft i am aware of could have. it then seemed to fall back (or circle) into the same path line that i had seen it initially rise. the exact way it moved is difficult to describe; almost as if redirecting from its initially intended change in course of moving upward and left from my perspective,(with the initial course as rising above the tree line toward my general direction) to heading back in the general direction of the point i was viewing from. yet it made this course change with no marked path of redirection, as would be seen viewing any conventional aircraft; by which i mean no banked turn motion or circular turn path. 

the light source was moving at such a slow pace i felt i had enough time to run inside and get my father to come out to view it, which i did. running back outside after yelling to my father i found the craft continuing on the same path in my general direction. my father came to my side and i simply told him to look in the direction from which the light source was approaching. he acknowledged the craft, but began to watch silently, almost with confusion. this was the same reaction i was experiencing. 

as it moved closer it became clear there were multiple lights, some pulsating inconsistently as well as emitting different colors. the colors ranged from yellow to orange to red and even blue, though the changes were almost instantaneous or unperceivable. the lights would pulse/blink in varying patterns as well, sometimes seemingly similar to the way roadwork arrow sign lights move when indicating direction. to both of us there was no distinguishable shape to whatever craft was emitting the lights, and to me it seemed to have an aura or rather a dark 'shadow' surrounding. while my father and i intermittently muttered back and forth about what we were seeing, i noted that there were no true 'strobe' lights coming from the source as there are on any regulated aircraft. he agreed but stated, "what gets me is that it isn't making any noise, no noise at all."

i hadn't even thought about that at first, possibly due to being sensory overloaded visually, but he was right. the craft, which at this point seemed almost directly overhead (some 75-85 degrees above the horizon) made no sound. no sound even after passing our position as a modern jet would have. at this point i did notice the sounds around our position. every dog, or at least it seemed every dog within my hearing distance, was going absolutely berserk, barking. i had completely forgotten about my own dog and realized that she was, as best i can describe, 'nervously pacing' back and forth in our driveway while whimpering. 

after its passing of our position my father and i watched as the lights and patterns became less visible in the night sky until we lost sight completely due to the hilly terrain. the entire experience probably only lasted around five minutes, but it affected me in a way i cannot explain. in recollection, it seemed so low and so slow moving. yet nothing about the craft's altitude, shape, or speed was definitive. i wish i knew what we saw. the only absolute thing i can say is that i do not know what it was. i'm not saying i saw aliens in a distinctly shaped craft with definable attributes, but i, along with my father, most certainly viewed an unidentifiable flying object. i will most likely never again look at anything in the night sky without skepticism.
content.summary: Slow moving completely silent craft, with undistinguishable size and shape. varying light patterns and colors, inconsistent with modern aircraft regulation, passing almost directly overhead.
